channel.title: Portfolio on Edison's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on Edison's Blog

item.title: Photo Collections
item.description: Intro Time flies, and the beauty is passing quickly Pick up a camera to capture those beautiful moments in life And record our colorful life Tokyo Night Camera：D850 Shutter：4s ISO：1000 Focal length：24mm Aperture：F6.6 This photo was taken at the Tokyo Tower, I did not use a tripod because it was a tourist photo. So I pressed the camera against the sightseeing glass to try to keep it steady. Candy Wheel Camera：D850
